title: OpenSea Co-Founder on the Future of NFTs - Devin Finzer
description: Devin Finzer is the CEO and Cofounder of OpenSea, the first peer-to-peer marketplace for blockchain-based assets. With the rise in popularity of NFTs and cryptocurrency, OpenSea is the world's largest NFT marketplace with trading volumes of over 3 BILLION dollars a month.
dc:creator: Reed Duchscher and Blake Robbins
itunes:summary: Devin Finzer is the CEO and Cofounder of OpenSea, the first peer-to-peer marketplace for blockchain-based assets. With the rise in popularity of NFTs and cryptocurrency, OpenSea is the world's largest NFT marketplace with trading volumes of over 3 BILLION dollars a month.
